content: the audrey crochet dress is fit and flare crochet dress with elegant cap sleeves the sleek and stylish silhouette creates an extremely versatile piece while the short sleeves and loose skirt make it perfect for summer this design is created raglan style from the neck down so the entire dress is only one piece sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
